ussr.samples.stickybot
Class StickyBot

java.lang.Object
  ussr.samples.stickybot.StickyBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Robot
public class StickyBot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Robot

A small round robot with connectors at N/S/E/W/U/D; connectors can stick to each other when close, in this case stickiness is globally controlled by the user.

Author:
ups
